metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to Civilian - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Clerk_002 - 4fd8e88d-75ca-4fc4-a73c-d8c7ba85b873 - (-102 9 -236)

0.speaker: Clerk Zollerix
0.text: Can't talk. Last time I missed quota, Head Banker Glitterbeard locked me in a safety deposit box.
0.context: NodeContext: Panicked shout - cowering while bank alarm goes off

1.speaker: Clerk Zollerix
1.context: NodeContext: Panicked shout - cowering while bank alarm goes off

2.speaker: Clerk Zollerix
2.text: It's the bloody vault staff slowing us. Bet you they're napping down there.
